entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
